message: (This probably should have gone in Feedback but it seems there's no way to delete a topic once created) Aside from the general convenience and goodness of Lanyrd I was pleased to see their site includes a colophon: http://lanyrd.com/colophon/  What sort of technology is powering Colophon (if you're free to discuss it, of course)?
@leah how did you become the 'third' Eric?

Now that there's a topic the "having to link to it all the time" should be minimized. But, sure, an onsite colophon would be handy. However maintaining adds an additional amount of overheard to the team. On my own list of Top 10 Convore enhancements this one ranks relatively low, especially that this blog post is even more well distributed.
Perhaps putting it into a summarised colophon on this site would be better.... would save on having to link to it all the time.

Indeed, now we'll have to link to the topic on all the time once it gets pushed into the ether ;) There's no need to maintain it particularly well, especially given other priorities... I doubt @ericflo will have the time to constantly update his blog post... but even if he did it would be certainly less messy to just have a colophon page.

Which would also need to be maintained, possibly also by the same @ericflo whom you claim (very rightly, no doubt) would not have the time to do so. :-) Again, I'm pro colophon for the site but this blog post is a good workaround unless/until that page appears.
